actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
m.app_id,
t.name as WorkspaceName,
a.name as APPName,
'chat' as type,
(sum(m.message_tokens) + sum(m.answer_tokens)) as token_count,
sum(m.total_price) as total_price,
count(*) as message_count
FROM
messages m
JOIN
apps a
ON
m.app_id = a.id
JOIN
tenants t
ON
a.tenant_id = t.id
WHERE
a.name ilike '%{{Table1.searchText}}%'
GROUP BY
t.name,m.app_id, a.name
UNION ALL
SELECT
m.app_id,
t.name as WorkspaceName,
a.name as APPName,
'workflow' as type,
sum(m.total_tokens) as token_count,
sum(m.total_tokens) as total_price,
count(m.id) as message_count
FROM
workflow_runs m
JOIN
apps a
ON
m.app_id = a.id
JOIN
tenants t
ON
a.tenant_id = t.id
WHERE
a.name ilike '%{{Table1.searchText}}%'
GROUP BY
t.name,m.app_id, a.name
ORDER BY
   token_count DESC
LIMIT
{{Table1.pageSize}}
OFFSET
{{Table1.pageOffset}}
